original_text: And immediately Jesus, perceiving in his spirit that they thus questioned within themselves, said to them, “Why do you question these things in your hearts?
korean_text: 그들이 속으로 이렇게 생각하는 줄을 예수께서 곧 중심에 아시고 이르시되 어찌하여 이것을 마음에 생각하느냐

sentences.original_text: that they thus questioned within themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 속으로 이렇게 의문을 품는 것을

sentences.original_text: “Why do you question these things in your hearts?
